title: People With Certain Medical Conditions And Covid-19 Risk Factors
content:
Overview
This information is for a general audience. Healthcare professionals should see
Underlying Medical Conditions Associated with Higher Risk for Severe COVID-19
for more detailed information.
Stay Up to Date With COVID-19 Vaccines
Staying up to date with COVID-19 vaccines and
following preventive measures
are especially important if you are older or have one or more health conditions, including those listed below.
Stay Up To Date
